description: Welcome to this well-maintained, move-in ready NON-STRATA rowhome in the prestigious Burke Mountain community, where modern living meets everyday convenience with NO STRATA FEES. The open-concept main floor features a bright kitchen with luxurious granite countertops, gas range, and a spacious pantry flowing seamlessly into the living and dining areas and a cozy family room. With four bedrooms and four bathrooms, this home offers plenty of space for your family. The fully finished basement that includes a huge storage space adds flexibility for extended family, a home gym, or a media room. Less than 5-minute drive to Shoppers Drug Mart, TD Bank, Leigh Elementary, Hyde Creek Rec Centre and future Burke Mountain Secondary School. Perfect canvas to create the home youâ€™ve been looking for!
